intro: Rodriguezia fuerstenbergii, commonly known as the Fuerstenberg's rodriguezia, is a striking tropical plant native to the rainforests of Central and South America. It is a member of the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton, and is characterized by its large, velvety leaves.
